code: import*as yup from"yup";var schema=yup.object().shape({fname:yup.string().required("This field is required."),lname:yup.string(),email:yup.string().email("This field is required."),password:yup.string().min(6).required("This field is required."),passwordConfirmation:yup.string().required("This field is required.").oneOf([yup.ref("password"),null],"Passwords must match"),createdAt:yup.date().default(function(){return new Date();})});export default schema;
